Wheeljack-X::

Jackie can't possibly dodge; the two opponents are a point-blank 
range.  He does manage to twist around somewhat so that the blasts 
strike across his chest and back instead of drilling into him, thus 
minimizing the damage somewhat.

"WAAASSSAAAAP!!!" he yells, squaring up again and launching three 
pairs of magneto-shells at his foe from his shoulder turrets..

OOC: The magneto-shell is a rather unusual weapon.  On impact it 
generates a localized magnetic field, shorting out electronics.  
Repeated hits can send a bot into stasis lock quickly no matter how 
well armored.  It also tends to wipe out short-term memory.

> and did a severe wound there. The Pain didn't let her react.
